text: Referring to previous negotiations, Mr. Macmillan looked towards Mr. Reginald played a conspicuous part, the Premier said. He dismissed the idea that Britain would be swamped by cheap labour. Our industry, he said, would probably gain. "Many people feel we have had, perhaps, too much shelter, he went on.
